title: [Roughened Path]
description: Deep with mud and surrounded by snow-speckled grass, the track stretches between an open glade of tree stumps towards a tent city that is perched to the east of a colorful aspen glade.  Glaesine orbs reflect the sunlight in a prism that creates rainbow swirls upon the ground, while a brisk arctic breeze carries with it the sound of neighing and whinnying from the distance.
